text: Yawovi Madji Agboyibo (31 December 1943, Republicoftogo.com, 11 January 2007 . â€“ 30 May 2020) was a Togolese politician. He was Prime Minister of Togo from September 2006 to December 2007. He was National President of the Action Committee for Renewal (CAR), an opposition political party, from 1991 to 2008. He died in Paris on 30 May 2020 after a short-illness, aged 76. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Prime ministers of Togo Category:2020 deaths
title: Yawovi Agboyibo
